posts.post_title: WTB: t206 Hal Chase pink and trophy
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Leslie Westbrook
I'm looking for low grade Hal Chase T206's. I need the pink portrait and the trophy card. Low grade only. I'll pay $50-60 for both in bad shape or $15-$25 for one of them---all depending on what they look like. I prefer to pay with Paypal. Thanks.
